svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ WHY RANDOMIZATION IS CRITICAL │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ Without Randomization: │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ Users who see treatment might be systematically │ │ │ │ different from users who see control │ │ │ │ │ │ │ │ Example: Power users opt into new features │ │ │ │ → Selection bias makes treatment look better │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ With Proper Randomization: │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ Users in control and treatment are statistically │ │ │ │ equivalent on ALL dimensions (measured & unmeasured)│ │ │ │ │ │ │ │ → Any difference in outcomes is caused by treatment │ │ │ │ → Enables causal inference │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
